titleStmt.title: Primitiae regiminis Davidici, or, The first fruits of Davids government vowed to God before, and offered at his actual admission thereunto / represented in a sermon at the assises held at Reading for the county of Berks, Feb. 28, 1653 by Simon Ford.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for John Rothwel,

notesStmt.note: "Published at the joint desire of the high sheriff and justices of peace for the said county which (with some misreports since blown about concerning it and the author) inclined him to give way thereunto."
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
